property.name: Text
property.value: (You may only have one Black Focus attached. If this car is discarded from your hand during combat, place it into play.) POWER: Attach to your MP. The next attack you perform this combat gains If this attack deals critical damage, draw a card. While attached, whenever an effect would raise your anger, you may banish the top card of your opponent's discard pile instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: (Limit 2 per deck.) POWER: Your opponent plays with their hand revealed until the start of your next turn. ANDROID: If you have 2 or less Traits, search your Life Deck for a Styled Setup or Styled Drill and play it. (Banish after use.)

property.name: Type
property.value: Physical Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: Physical attack. Choose a random card from your opponent's hand and reveal it. If that card is a SHIELD card, this attack cannot be stopped. DAMAGE: AT +4 stages. HIT: Raise or lower both players' anger 2 levels. (Banish after use.)

property.name: Type
property.value: Physical Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: Physical attack. Raise your anger 1 level. You may discard a card from your hand to lower your opponent's anger 1 level and place a Styled card from your discard pile on top of your Life Deck. DAMAGE: AT +3 stages. (Banish after use.)

property.name: Type
property.value: Energy Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: Energy attack costing 3 stages. If this attack is stopped, your next Styled attack this combat cannot be stopped. DAMAGE: 4 life cards. HIT: Your opponent discards a card from their hand. (Banish after use.)

property.name: Text
property.value: CONSTANT POWER: Your opponent's attacks deal -1 stage and -1 life card of damage. If your MP is level 2, your opponent cannot use effects that change your level.

property.name: Text
property.value: Prevent all damage from an attack. You may discard a card from your hand to perform a copy of that attack for your next action. ALIEN: If you do, that attack is considered to deal critical damage. Raise or lower a player's anger 2 levels. (Banish after use.)

property.name: Type
property.value: Physical Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: Stops a phyiscal attack. You may banish an Ally you control. If you do, search your Life Deck or discard pile for a Styled Drill and place it into play.

property.name: Type
property.value: Energy Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: (This attack's cost must be payed by an Ally you control, regardless of your MP's power stage.) Energy attack costing 4 stages. Damage from this attack cannot be modified. DAMAGE: 10 life cards. (Banish after use.)

property.name: Type
property.value: Energy Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: Stops an energy attack. Lower your opponent's anger 2 levels. Until the end of your next turn, after you use a Setup, lower your opponent's anger 1 level.

property.name: Text
property.value: CONSTANT POWER: Whenever a Dragon Ball entrs or leaves play, banish the bottom card of your opponent's discard pile. GOD: Your attacks deal +1 life card of damage. INSTANT POWER: Use when your opponent captures a Dragon Ball. Your opponent cannot use its immediate effects.

property.name: Text
property.value: INSTANT POWER: Use when entering combat. Look at the top 2 cards of your Life Deck and place any number of them on the top or bottom of your Life Deck. POWER: Gain 2 stages. If your MP has 2 or less Traits, choose a Styled SWORD card in your discard pile and shuffle it into your Life Deck.

property.name: Type
property.value: Physical Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: Physical attack. Lower your opponent's anger 1 level. DAMAGE: 5 stages. (Shuffle this card into your Life Deck after use.)

property.name: Type
property.value: Energy Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: Energy attack costing 2 stages. If you control 3 or more Dragon Balls, you may destroy a Setup, Drill, or Ally. If your MP has 2 or less Traits, choose a card in your discard pile and Rejuvenate it. DAMAGE: 5 life cards.

property.name: Type
property.value: Energy Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: Energy attack costing 1 stage. Destroy the top card of your opponent's Life Deck. DAMAGE: 2 life cards. HIT: You may banish a Dragon Ball you own in play. If you do, destroy the top 4 cards of your opponent's Life Deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: INSTANT POWER: EARTHLING: Use at the start of your Rejuvenation Step. Choose a Styled card in your discard pile and Rejuvenate it. INSTANT POWER: Use when an opponent's effect would cause another Styled Drill you control to leave play. Destroy the top 4 cards of your Life Deck to cancel that effect.

property.name: Text
property.value: CONSTANT POWER: Your Styled attacks deal +1 life card of damage. INSTANT POWER: Use after performing a successful Styled attack. Damage from that attack cannot be prevented.

property.value: CONSTANT POWER: Your Styled physical attacks deal +1 stage of damage. INSTANT POWER: Use when entering combat. Draw a card. Discard a card from your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: POWER: Use a critical damage effect. Lower your opponent's anger 1 level. EARTHLING: Gain 5 stages. If the highest power level on your MP's level 4 is 500,000 or greater, shuffle into your Life Deck after use.

property.name: Text
property.value: Energy attack costing 2 stages. Raise your anger 1 level. Damage from this attack is banished. You may lower your anger 2 levels. If you do, banish the top or bottom 3 cards of your opponent's discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: (You may only have one Saiyan Combative Stance attached.) POWER: Draw a card. Attach to your MP. While attached, once per combat, after you discard a Styled card with Endurance from your hand, gain 3 stages and choose a Styled card in your discard pile and shuffle it into your Life Deck.

property.name: Type
property.value: Physical Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: Physical attack. After you use a HIT effect this combat, lower your opponent's anger 1 level. The next time a card effect causes you to discard a Styled card with Endurance from your hand this combat, draw a card. DAMAGE: 6 stages. (Banish after use.)

property.name: Type
property.value: Physical Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: Physical attack costing 1 stage. If the highest power level on your MP's level 4 is 500,000 or less, you may destroy the top card of your Life Deck. If you do, this attack stays in play to be used a second time this combat. DAMAGE: 5 stages. HIT: Lower your opponent's anger 1 level. (Banish after use.)

property.name: Type
property.value: Physical Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: (This card's Endurance is considered to be 5 for your card effects.) Stops an energy attack. Lower your opponent's anger 1 level. Your attacks deal +X stages of damage this combat. X = your MP's current level.

property.name: Type
property.value: Energy Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: Energy attack costing 2 stages. Banish an opponent's Ally or Setup. MAJIN: You may banish 4 cards from your discard pile. If you do, Rejuvenate this card after use. DAMAGE: 6 life cards. HIT: Lower your opponent's anger 2 levels.

property.name: Text
property.value: (You may only have one Deflection Drill in play. As an action, you may banish this card from your hand to gain 5 stages.) INSTANT POWER: Use when an opponent's card effect would destroy or banish cards from the top of your Life Deck. Destroy that many cards from the top of your opponent's Life Deck instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: (Limit 1 per deck.) INSTANT POWER: GOD: If you have 2 or less Traits, use when an Event is played or a Setup Power is used. Cancel the effects of that card. (Shuffle into your Life Deck after use.)

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Ultra Rare

property.name: Text
property.value: (You may banish this card from your hand when an effect would cause a player to skip or pass an action to cancel that effect.) Stops a physical or energy attack. If that attack was a Physical Combat or Energy Combat card, return it to your opponent's hand. Draw a card. Gain 2 stages or your opponent loses 2 stages. (Banish after use.)

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Ultra Rare

property.name: Text
property.value: POWER: Destroy an opponent's Setup, Drill, Ally, or attached card.

property.name: Type
property.value: Energy Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: Energy Attack costing 2 stages. Lower your opponent's anger 2 levels. DAMAGE: 5 life cards. HIT: your opponent cannot gain anger this combat. (Banish after use.)

property.name: Text
property.value: (If this card is banished for Endurance, you may discard a card at random from your opponent's hand. If you do, your opponent draws a card.) POWER: Search your Life Deck or discard pile for an Ally and play it. You may banish an Ally you control to end combat. (Banish after use.)

property.name: Text
property.value: (This card gains +X Endurance. X = the number of MAJIN Allies you control.) POWER: Search your Life Deck or discard pile for a MAJIN Ally and place it into play at 3 stages above 0. Raise that Ally to its highest power stage or destroy the top X cards of your opponent's Life Deck. X = the number of MAJIN Allies you control. (Banish after use.)

property.name: Text
property.value: (Limit 1 per deck. Whenever this card leaves play, banish the card Buu's Candy was attached to.) POWER: Attach to an opponent's Setup in play. Gain control of that Setup and it loses all effects. While attached, you may banish this card as an action to lower your opponent's anger 2 levels and banish the top 2 cards of your opponent's discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: (Limit 1 per deck. Whenever this card leaves play, banish the card Buu's Chocolate was attached to.) POWER: Attach to a Drill in play. Gain control of that Drill and it loses all effects. While attached, you may banish this card as an action to raise your anger 1 level and your opponent loses 3 stages.

property.name: Text
property.value: (Limit 1 per deck. Whenever this card leaves play, banish the card Buu's Cookie was attached to.) POWER: Attach to an Ally in play. Gain control of that Ally, it loses all effects, and it cannot make actions nor have damage redirected to it. While attached, you may banish this card as an action to gain 2 stages and Rejuvenate 2.
